assignments.title: learn gravity
assignments.description:
##LEARNING##
Asking questions is a super way to learn new things and understand the world around you! When you ask 'Who?', you want to know about a person or an animal. If you ask 'What?', you want to know about a thing or an idea. 'Where?' helps you find a place, and 'When?' tells you about time. 'Why?' helps you understand the reason for something, and 'How?' explains how something works. Good questions help you get smarter every day!

##QUIZ##
1. Which question word helps you find out about a person or animal? A) What B) Where C) Who* D) When 2. If you want to know the reason for something, which word should you use? A) How B) Why* C) What D) Where 3. Which question word asks about a place? A) When B) Who C) Where* D) Why 4. What question word helps you learn about a thing or an idea? A) How B) Who C) What* D) Why 5. If you want to know about time, which word should you use? A) When* B) Where C) What D) Who 6. Which question word helps you understand how something works? A) Why B) What C) How* D) When
